RR_verdict: We found the Adidas Terrex Agravic Speed Ultra to be a wild ride—like a Ferrari with all-terrain tyres. Its bouncy Lightstrike Pro midsole, grippy Continental rubber, and race-ready upper make it perfect for midfoot and forefoot strikers who fly over easy trails. We were impressed by its aggressive rocker, fueling nonstop forward momentum. However, its super-tight midfoot and minimal heel support aren’t ideal for everyone. But if you match the fit and terrain, this trail supershoe feels incredible.
awards: Top pick in best Running shoes for knee pain, Top pick in best ultra running shoes, Top 15% in trail running shoes, Top 26% in Adidas running shoes
